page.title: 16Clubs-Witton & Ridlington
page.content: The W.I. meets monthly & the Natter club for older people who meet to exchange news & play cards,meets fortnightly.Bingo is played weekly there is a weekly whist drive. {Village Hall}Witton & Ridlington are fortunate in having a good,small, modern village hall,the right size for the numbers that use it:hire charges are very moderate.All clubs meet here. {Events}The N.Norfolk Harriers meet at intervals.Each spring Bank Holiday Monday there is a walkabout in the grounds of Witton Hall,proceeds in aid of Witton Church:Â£900 was raised in 1985.A car boot sale was held in aid of the Village Hall & coffee mornings & jumble sales are held for various charities.Sponsored cycle ride is held annually in aid of Churches in the Norfolk Diocese.
